phases.phase_name: Robot arm positions itself over buttons
phases.description: The robotic arm is initially stationary, hovering above three colored buttons (red, blue, green) on a wooden box. It begins to slowly adjust its position, preparing to interact with the buttons.

phases.phase_name: Robot arm moves toward the rightmost button
phases.description: The robotic arm moves its end effector closer to the green button on the right. It adjusts its angle and position, aligning its gripper with the button for potential interaction.

phases.phase_name: Robot arm retracts slightly and stabilizes
phases.description: The robotic arm slightly retracts and stabilizes its position, maintaining alignment with the green button. It appears to be pausing, possibly awaiting a command or preparing for the next action.

summary: The robotic arm moves toward and aligns with the green button on a wooden box, then stabilizes, indicating preparation for interaction.
